person.persName: Joshua Spering (Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, attorney, commissioner of deeds, and councilman)

body.p: Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, attorney, commissioner of deeds, and councilman. Pennsylvania native. Married to Eleanor Spering. Father of Sallie Spering, Elizabeth Spering, Emily Spering, Ellen Spering, and Alfred Spering. Attorney in Philadelphia in 1860. Commissioner of deeds for the Commonwealth of Kentucky in Pennsylvania in 1865. Member of the Select Council of Philadelphia from 1865 to 1868. Member of the Republican Party.
